document.full_text: nascar cleared kyle busch for his role in an altercation with 65-year-old car owner richard childress after the trucks series race at kansas speedway.
document.title: nascar clears busch in altercation with childress
lines_and_colors: nascar cleared kyle busch for his role in an altercation with 65-year-old car owner richard childress after the trucks series race at kansas speedway.
